section.title: Introduction
section.p: Forrest supplies a collection of default skins which are configurable and so should meet the needs of most projects. This document explains those default skins.
The skin names are based on playing with the word "skin". See our technique for choosing skin names.

section.title: crust
section.p: This skin used to be called "forrest-site" which evolved to become "krysalis-site".

section.title: pelt
section.p: Uses CSS "div" and no HTML tables.
During its development, this skin used to be called "css-style-dev".

section.title: tigris-1_1
section.p: This skin is based on version 1.1 of the style.tigris.org project. (It deliberately contravenes our skin naming convention.)
